title: Cleveland Mayor: Democrats 'forgot to talk about wealth creation' and 'economic freedom'
description: Cleveland Mayor Justin Bibb was sworn into office in January 2022. Chuck talks with the mayor about crime, economics, and the role that sports can play in supporting the city.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
